! Title: uBlock-Origin-dev-filter – Brave – wikipedia
! Expires: 1 day
! Description: Filters to block and remove copycat-websites from search engines. Specific to dev websites like StackOverflow or GitHub.
! Homepage: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter
! Licence: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/blob/main/LICENSE
!
! GitHub issues: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/issues
! GitHub pull requests: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/pulls
*://encyclopedia.thefreedictionary.com/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="encyclopedia.thefreedictionary.com"])
*://www.algebra.com/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="www.algebra.com"])
*://wikizero.com/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="wikizero.com"])
*://mediawiki.feverous.co.uk/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="mediawiki.feverous.co.uk"])
*://everything.explained.today/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="everything.explained.today"])
*://www.wiwa.wiki/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="www.wiwa.wiki"])
*://findatwiki.com/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="findatwiki.com"])
*://www.wikide.wiki/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="www.wikide.wiki"])
*://www.wikit.wiki/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="www.wikit.wiki"])
*://www.secret-bases.co.uk/wiki/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="www.secret-bases.co.uk/wiki"])
*://www.scholarship.edu.vn/wiki/*
search.brave.com###results > div:has(a[href*="www.scholarship.edu.vn/wiki"])
